Control Name: OPS 5.10 Fully automate integration and deployment
Control Statement: Automate build, deployment, and testing of the workload. This reduces errors caused by manual processes and reduces the eﬀort to deploy changes.

control_attributes.Control: OPS 5.10 Fully automate integration and deployment
control_attributes.Subcategory: How do you reduce defects, ease remediation, and improve ﬂow into production?
